CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors. Sam Becry and Zenobie Rucker, winners of the mixed pairs, receive their trophies from Mrs. Norine Mitchell of Chicago, Midwestern vice president...All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Zenobia Rucker and Sam Becry, receiving mixed doubles trophies from Norine Mitchell, in Kay Boys Club for the Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American  Bridge Association
